summary: During World War II, the British Royal Navy used experimental midget submarines to raid German warships in Norway.
cast: James Caan|David Sumner|Norman Bowler|Brian Grellis|Paul Young|William Dysart|John Kelland|Kenneth Farrington|Keith Alexander|Carl Rigg|Steve Kirby|Nick Tate|George Pravda|Diana Beevers|Rupert Davies|Hans De Vries|Paul Hansard|Desmond Jordan|Dennis Mayers|George Roubicek|Richard Steele
director: Director: William A. Graham (as William Graham)
title: Submarino X-1
